aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-4070-707 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 01/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 03/08/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 03/08/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 06/08/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 09/08/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
